title: Guerra de Idolos
resume: Take a look at Telemundo's highly anticipated new drama. Guerra de Ídolos (Price of Fame) the brand new Telemundo musical drama series.. The series tells us the story of super star Julian César Solar an idol of Mexican music and ignites this story of betrayal, rivalry, love and the pursuit of fame at any cost...
